targets.rawSql:
Select 
	startTime as time,
	Notification, 
	cdr_voice_details_daily as TableName
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN ANSWERING_TIME>=DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,
'stc_cdr_data','cdr_voice_details_daily'
,(select ANSWERING_TIME from `stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_daily`
ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime 
 FROM 
`stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_daily`  ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 )
as data1
where data1.Notification = 0 and $__timeFilter(data1.startTime)

union all
Select 
	startTime as time,
	Notification, 
	cdr_voice_details_hourly as TableName
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN ANSWERING_TIME>=DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,'stc_cdr_data','cdr_voice_details_hourly'
,(select ANSWERING_TIME from `stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_hourly`
ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime
 FROM `stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_hourly`  ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 )
as data2
where data2.Notification = 0 and $__timeFilter(data2.startTime)

union all

Select 
	startTime as time,
	Notification, 
	cdr_voice_details_monthly as TableName
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN ANSWERING_TIME>=DATE_FORMAT(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y/%m/01') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,'stc_cdr_data','cdr_voice_details_monthly'
,(select ANSWERING_TIME from `stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_monthly`
ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime

as data3
where data3.Notification = 0 and $__timeFilter(data3.startTime)

union all

,(select ANSWERING_TIME from `stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_weekly`
ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime

Select 
	cdr_voice_details_daily as TableName,
	data as DatabaseName,
	Notification,
  startTime as time
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN ANSWERING_TIME>=DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,
'$DB_stc_cdr_data' as data,'cdr_voice_details_daily'
,(select ANSWERING_TIME from `$DB_stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_daily`
ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime 
 FROM 
`$DB_stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_daily`  ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 )
as data1
where data1.Notification = 0 and $__timeFilter(data1.startTime)

union all
